About Fikanova

Redefining how SMEs operate in the modern economy through intelligent automation

24/7 AI Agents Active
2025 Founded
Nairobi Headquarters
The Name

What is Fikanova?

Our name is a fusion of three powerful concepts:

Fikra üá∞üá™ Swahili for "Idea"
+
Arcane Mysterious Knowledge
+
Nova A Star Reborn

Ideas illuminated by hidden knowledge, bursting into new life.

Our Vision

A world where every business, regardless of size, can access enterprise-grade AI technology to compete and thrive in the digital economy.

Our Mission

To liberate businesses from manual drudgery by building intelligent digital workforces that work 24/7, enabling humans to focus on strategy and growth.

What Drives Us

Our Values

Innovation

We embrace new technologies to solve problems and push the boundaries of what's possible.

Quality

We deliver excellence in every project, treating each client's business as if it were our own.

Partnership

We grow together with our clients, building long-term relationships based on trust and shared success.

Our Approach

Human-AI Collaboration Models

Keeping humans involved ensures ethical judgment, accuracy, and accountability

HITL

Human-in-the-Loop

The AI acts as an assistant while humans make final decisions. Ideal for complex scenarios (healthcare, legal, recruiting) where compassionate judgment is essential.

ü§ñ AI Analyzes ‚Üí üìã Recommends ‚Üí üë§ Human Decides
HOTL

Human-on-the-Loop

The AI acts autonomously with human oversight. Effective for automation where humans monitor and intervene only when the system fails or needs guidance.

ü§ñ AI Acts ‚Üí üìä Reports ‚Üí üëÄ Human Monitors
Our Team
